city.cs.engine

Class AttachedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.AttachedImage

  • public class AttachedImage
extends Object
    Instances of images. Each image instance can specify different scale, rotation, translation and reflection (flip) attributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttachedImage(Body body, BodyImage image, float scale, float rotation, Vec2 offset)
      Create a new instance of an image.

    • Method Summary

      Flip the orientation of this image instance vertically (reflect in a horizontal axis passing through the origin).

      The BodyImage of which this is an instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttachedImage

        public AttachedImage(Body body,
                     BodyImage image,
                     float scale,
                     float rotation,
                     Vec2 offset)
        Create a new instance of an image. The same image can be instantiated multiple times but each instance is attached to exactly one body. Each image instance is independently scaled, rotated, translated and flipped (in that order).
        Parameters:
        body - the body to which this instance will be attached
        image - the image
        scale - the scale at which to draw this instance (1.0 is full size)
        rotation - the angle (in radians) by which to rotate around the body's origin
        offset - the offset from the body's origin at which to draw this instance

    • Method Detail

      • getBodyImage

        public BodyImage getBodyImage()
        The BodyImage of which this is an instance.
        Returns:
        the BodyImage

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset scale, rotation and offset to their original values. Note: does not reset the flip attributes.

      • flipHorizontal

        public void flipHorizontal()
        Flip the orientation of this image instance horizontally (reflect in a vertical axis passing through the origin). The flip is applied after scaling, rotation and translation.

      • flipVertical

        public void flipVertical()
        Flip the orientation of this image instance vertically (reflect in a horizontal axis passing through the origin). The flip is applied after scaling, rotation and translation.

      • getScale

        public float getScale()
        The scale factor for this image instance.
        Returns:
        the scale factor

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scale)
        Set the scale factor for this image instance.
        Parameters:
        scale - the new scale factor

      • getRotation

        public float getRotation()
        The angle of rotation for this image instance.
        Returns:
        the angle of rotation (in radians)

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float rotation)
        Set the angle of rotation for this image instance.
        Parameters:
        rotation - the new angle (in radians)

      • getOffset

        public Vec2 getOffset()
        The offset for this image instance.
        Returns:
        a copy of the offset

      • setOffset

        public void setOffset(Vec2 offset)
        Set the offset for this image instance.
        Parameters:
        offset - the new offset

      • isFlippedHorizontal

        public boolean isFlippedHorizontal()
        Is this image instance flipped horizontally relative to its original state?
        Returns:
        true if this image instance is flipped horizontally relative to its original state, false otherwise

      • isFlippedVertical

        public boolean isFlippedVertical()
        Is this image instance flipped vertically relative to its original state?
        Returns:
        true if this image instance is flipped vertically relative to its original state, false otherwise
